#labels Abbreviation
Top4Net SDK中使用的编写词一览：
|| *缩写* || *全称* ||
|| cid || Category Id ||
|| iid || Item Id ||
|| oid || Order Id ||
|| pid || Property ||
|| rid || Refund Id ||
|| sid || Shop/Shipping Id ||
|| tid || Trade Id ||
|| uid || User Id ||
|| vid || Value Id ||

注：严格禁止代码中使用pid作为Product/Picture Id，但阿里妈妈的PID例外。
